AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO.   15    /2010 
 
 
Subject:-   Fire crackers being used for bird scare. 
                 
                In the backdrop of detection of explosive material on board on airlines 
recently, it has been decided that:- 
 
(a) 
Permission to use sharp shooters with shot gun/ 12 bore gun in the 
airside be withdrawn with immediate affect. 
 
(b) 
Electrically/mechanically operated bird scaring devices which do not 
contain any explosive material be installed at all the airports. 
 
(c) 
Similar type of devices which are presently being utilised at airports be 
installed. 
 
(d) 
Current stocks of crackers and ammunition at airports be completely 
exhausted and confirmation be given by 31st July 2010. 
 
 
(e)   Installation of bird scaring devices be completed by 31st July 2010 and 
confirmation on same be given by 01 August 2010. 
 
         This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya, IPS) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
